152.content:
“Let’s go explore it.” Ethan said. Murmurs in the group stirred up discussing whether or not it was a good idea. As for you, you had arguments for both sides.

Since it was a house, that meant there was someone…or something living here. If they were friendly, they could help you and your crew. However, it could be dangerous and you didn’t even know if the creature living there was even human.

As you were thinking, the ground suddenly started to shake. The tremors quickly got worse causing people to become afraid. Within a minute, you noticed a beautiful woman appear. However, it was clear she wasn’t a normal creature.

The first and easiest thing to notice was that this woman was much larger than any human. Her height seemed to be perfect for living in the humongous house. The next thing to point out was that her outfit wasn’t normal. Instead of a modern outfit, she wore a pair of bra and panties similar to what a cavewoman would wear. She also carried a large purse that looked like it could hold a mountain. The woman quickly noticed your group and stopped.

“Are those…humans? What are they doing here?” She said to herself. Some of the group was intimidated by her presence while another part was more interested. You held your breath, unsure of how to handle this. After a moment, the giantess smiled.

“I bet you’ll all be a nice edition to my daughter’s sleepover.” She said. She reached into her purse and pulled out a bag. With quick speed, she started getting grab people including some of your friends. You helplessly watched as she dropped them into the bag.

People started running, afraid to get grabbed. You watched as more and more people were collected. When your eyes locked with the woman’s, you started running as well. You knew it was no use but you didn’t see much choice. You soon felt the woman grab you and lift you up. She held you over the bag making you squirm like mad. You screamed as she let go making you fall in. As the darkness surrounded you, you passed out.

When you woke up, your head was a bit dizzy. You weren’t sure where you were but it was pretty dark. You could hear voices but you couldn’t tell where they were coming from. When your head started to clear, you figured out you were…
152.title: Caught By A Giantess
